tool.name: CD-HIT filter

param.name: clusters
param.label: Cluster sequence file
param.help: FASTA file containing the CD-HIT-EST clusters.

param.name: min_size
param.label: Minimum cluster size
param.help: The minimum number of reads per cluster.

tool.help: Filter the clusters produced by CD-HIT based on a minimum cluster size, usefull for removing singletons from the cluster data. Note: this tool only works for non-zipped cluster files.
